inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of severe native aortic valve disease with the indication to endovascular valve replacement given by Heart Team
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: valve replacement given by Heart Team
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of at least one coronary stenosis >50% at angiography
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No specific pharmacologic treatment is required to enter the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Signs or symptoms of acute (unstable) myocardial ischemia
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication to adenosine administration (e.g., asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, heart rate <50 beats/min, and systolic blood pressure <90 mmHg)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Reduced survival expectancy due to severe co-morbidities (<1 year)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe native aortic valve disease with indication for endovascular valve replacement, and no specific pharmacologic treatment is required. However, impaired left ventricular function may be a concern.
